column4: OK. A simple, but vital question, I think: I have a DELL Latitude D800 (or, any other random laptop). I don't have an external microphone that I plugged in. I just want to record sound from the device built into my laptop. What should I turn on in "Volume Control"? Micriphone? Capture? Line-In? Something else?
i imagine it'd be microphone. is that not working?
Microphone appears in "Playback" when I enable it, and not in "Recording".
